title: Twelve sermons preached on several occasions. The first volume by the Right Reverend Father in God Edward Lord Bishop of Worcester.
author: Stillingfleet, Edward, 1635-1699.
publisher: Printed by J.H. for Henry Mortlock ...,
notes: A second volume was published in 1697 with title: Ten sermons preached on several occasions; a third volume in 1698 with title: Thirteen sermons preached on several occasions; and a fourth volume in 1701 with title: Twelve sermons preached on several occasions.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
